apple_vendor_description: On Apple devices, this heartwarming emoji portrays a couple, a woman with a light skin tone and a person with a dark skin tone, united by a floating heart. Appleâ€™s signature 3D shading and smooth gradients lend a soft, loving aura to their interaction, with subtle highlights on their faces conveying tenderness. The heart itself glows with a gentle luminescence, a symbol of their shared affection, making this a beautiful way to express romantic love and partnership.
